lead-art-block.fullscreen-enter.de: Vollbildmodus mit Anzeige des Hauptbildes öffnen
lead-art-block.fullscreen-enter.en: Enter full screen mode displaying the lead image
lead-art-block.fullscreen-enter.es: Entrar en el modo de pantalla completa mostrando la imagen principal
lead-art-block.fullscreen-enter.fr: Entrer dans le mode plein écran en affichant l'image principale
lead-art-block.fullscreen-enter.ja: リード画像を表示する全画面表示モードに入る

lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.de: Vollbildmodus mit Anzeige des Hauptbildes beenden
lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.en: Exit full screen mode displaying the lead image
lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.es: Salir del modo de pantalla completa mostrando la imagen principal
lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.fr: Quitter le mode plein écran en affichant l'image principale

lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.pt: Sair do modo de ecrã completo mostrando a imagem principal
lead-art-block.fullscreen-exit.sv: Avsluta helskärmsläge med visning av huvudbilden
